item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:4, topic:537683”]Did you get a moderator to approve of your link?

But good luck with your staff search, not sure why you would have two different moderation groups for both of the worlds when having one set would be perfectly fine. The same goes for the donation ranks, why create multiple when a single one is sufficient. Just because both words are of different revisions doesn’t mean you should isolate them from each other, do you see Jagex doing this? Isolating them like this will also mean the community will be isolated one will think it’s superior then the other just like how it is here with the RSC section. You may also want to try and allow the community to build up before you toss out a bunch of staff positions to fill in.[/quote]

This is how i did innovation back in the day. And it worked well so thanks for your opinion.

Read full topic

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Did you get a moderator to approve of your link?

But good luck with your staff search, not sure why you would have two different moderation groups for both of the worlds when having one set would be perfectly fine. The same goes for the donation ranks, why create multiple when a single one is sufficient. Just because both words are of different revisions doesn’t mean you should isolate them from each other, do you see Jagex doing this? Isolating them like this will also mean the community will be isolated one will think it’s superior then the other just like how it is here with the RSC section. You may also want to try and allow the community to build up before you toss out a bunch of staff positions to fill in.
